bibl.author: Forte, Antonio
bibl.title: Political Propaganda and Ideology in China at the End of the Seventh Century: Inquiry into the Nature, Authors and Function of the Tunhuang Document S.6502 followed by an Annotated Translation
bibl.note: The subject of this monograph is a Chinese document from the Stein Collection of Chinese MSS in the British Library. The author shows that this document was meant to induce the widest possible consent for Wu Chao's seizure of power and as such was a political tract utilizing all the outstanding ideologies in a functional way. 33 b/w plates.
